Source.Name: clpeak
Source.Summary: A tool which profiles OpenCL devices to find their peak capacities.
Source.Description: A synthetic benchmarking tool to measure peak capabilities of opencl devices. It only measures the peak metrics that can be achieved using vector operations and does not represent a real-world use case.

Package.Name: clpeak
Package.Summary: A tool which profiles OpenCL devices to find their peak capacities.
Package.Description: A synthetic benchmarking tool to measure peak capabilities of opencl devices. It only measures the peak metrics that can be achieved using vector operations and does not represent a real-world use case.
